titles.title: 21st Century SKILLS Act
21st Century SKILLS Act
21st Century Skills are Key to Individuals' Life-Long Success Act
A bill to amend the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to provide training services linked to employment demand through skills training grants, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
